title: GitLab security advisory (AV25-507)
description: On August 13, 2025, GitLab published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: GitLab Community Edition (CE)  versions prior to 18.2.2, 18.1.4 and 18.0.6
GitLab Enterprise Edition (EE)  versions prior to 18.2.2, 18.1.4 and 18.0.6
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
